prompt_base: hyperdetailed photograph of an imposing tall alien man, dark green matte skin texture, black cape and white turban, intense focused eyes, muscular physique
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k, cinematic volumetric lighting, detailed skin surface imperfections, wet/sweaty look on the skin, metallic reflections on armor/pads, professional studio light
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, CGI, toy, plastic, smooth green skin, cell shaded, overly saturated green, yellow lighting, bad anatomy, unrealistic textures
